name: Moire Patterns - Essential Play Ep I - KNR 006
description:
MOIRE PATTERNS - ESSENTIAL PLAY I - KNR 006
Moire Patterns seds his most essential of hellos to the world, with his new release on Knuggles Recordings, featuring two delicious tracks on 12" (vinyl only).

A WARNING PARROTS
It's a Warning! Warning! Warning! Moire Patterns with Nic 2Birilli welcome the summer with a Live Recorded Jam, inspired by their Mediterranean origins. A balearic journey unto its own.

AA LOFTY PRINCIPLE
Are you ready to elevate your principles? Do you have the strength to carry on?
Nikolaos' love of the raw & analog ways has created a piece of work with 808 garage elements that set off waves and twirl you into ecstasy. Mixmasters will love this one.

https://soundcloud.com/moirepatterns/sets/moire-patterns-essential-play

name: Moire Patterns - The Roots Anthems (Vinyl Sampler) - CLAAP 011
description: "Claap" : New addition to our artists and we are glad to welcome Moire Patterns with his debut EP on the label. This record is a vinyl sampler of Moire Patterns debut long player coming up on Claap! But lets not spoil all of the magic and keep some details secret still. Moire Patterns combines effortlessly disco, house and techno elements with a punk production attitude!  Powerful, dancefloor focused and yet airy and deep, the record showcases Moire Patterns different moods and directions. The remix comes from  Detroit’s own Santonio Echols! Zipping up your boots? We ‘re going back to the roots!

name: Mirko Hecktor / Homeless House ‎– Gent 88' - KNR 003
description:
Gent 88 is a deep and constantly shuffled Oldschool Techno bumper by producer Mirko Hecktor from Munich with a striking triole bells theme and recurring female vocals.

The track was produced as a homage to the early days of the Belgian label R&S Records, which was the blueprint label for releasing Techno and House Music on the european mainland.

The HOMELESS HOUSE remix, produced by Berlin based Moire Patterns & Dj Kriton, takes the track back to Chicago and into a massive club atmosphere with a stomping underground attitude.

Released by: KNUGGLES RECORDINGS 
Release/catalogue number: KNR003 
Release date: May 14, 2012 

*support by Joao Maria (Assemble Music), Visti, Skudge, Carlos Nilmmns (Ornaments/4lux), Frawl, Se-Te-Ve, Joe Montana & more

name: Netto Houz / Moire Patterns ‎– 7107 Music (Original 12" Mix) / The Roots Anthems 001 - KNR 002
description:
The second release by Berlin based Knuggles Recordings is out since the 21st of December 2011. It features the previously unreleased Original 12" Mix of "7107 Music" by Netto Houz. This hybrid of Chicago Deep House and Oldschool Electro caused some dancefloor action back in 1998, when it was originally released on Ladomat 2000.

On the flipside, Knuggles Recordings presents a new exciting producer: DJ Nikolaos aka MOIRE PATTERNS spins his track "The Roots Anthems 001" (co-produced by DJ Kriton) into a modern and spherical growing Deep House bomb. Enjoy!

Released by: Knuggles Recordings 
Release/catalogue number: KNR002 
Release date: Dec 21, 2011 

*support by: Alex Barck, GummiHz, Mirko Hecktor
